function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High-density urban housing does not offer restorative experiences for residents","Impact":"Negative impact on mental and physical health of residents, leading to stress and reduced well-being","Mitigation":"Integrating restorative environmental design principles into the design of high-density urban housing","Technologies":"Biophilic design, natural lighting, green spaces, indoor plants","People":"Occupants of high-density urban housing","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, developers"},{"Description":"Increased amount of time spent indoors due to pandemic-related city shutdowns","Impact":"Higher risk of exposure to contagious diseases due to close proximity to others and limited outdoor activities","Mitigation":"Enhancing indoor air quality, promoting physical activity within the building, and implementing infection control measures","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems, touchless technology, antimicrobial surfaces","People":"Residents of high-rise apartments","Owner":"Property managers, building owners, public health officials"},{"Description":"Lack of emphasis on occupant wellbeing and health in residential design","Impact":"Long-term negative effects on the physical and mental health of residents, reduced quality of life","Mitigation":"Implementing wellness-oriented design strategies, providing access to outdoor spaces, and integrating health-promoting elements into the building environment","Technologies":"Wellness technology, fitness amenities, biophilic design elements","People":"Residents of urban housing","Owner":"Architects, developers, public health agencies"}]}
